ai-patthana8.11:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.11:1.1_0: Neither form doesn’t give rise to the cause or condition for the sake of form.
ai-patthana8.11:1.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to the cause or condition for the sake of form.
ai-patthana8.11:1.1_2: Neither form nor formlessness arise because of form,
ai-patthana8.11:2.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to the cause or condition for the sake of form.
ai-patthana8.11:2.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to the cause or condition for the sake of form.
ai-patthana8.11:2.1_2: Neither form nor formlessness arise because of form: the formless realm, and the causes and conditions for the sake of their condition.
ai-patthana8.11:3.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to the formless, or for the sake of non-realm.
ai-patthana8.11:3.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to the formless, or for the sake of form.
ai-patthana8.11:3.1_2: don’t give rise to the formless, and the formless.
ai-patthana8.11:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.11:4.1_0: ‘... for the sake of nine objects.’ ...
ai-patthana8.11:5.1_0: Or also in the same way, the question of  is the same as the matter.
